strapiPost.title: Coming Together
strapiPost.content:
The City of Bentonville, the Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion Community Task Force, and Downtown Bentonville Inc. are coming together - for the betterment of all - to put on "Bentonville Together: A Celebration of Our Multicultural Community."

  • Building bridges: The free event is scheduled for Aug 21 and will feature opportunities for the community to taste, discover, and learn about other cultures.
  • Quote: "The purpose of this free event is to provide an opportunity for Bentonville residents to celebrate their respective cultures and introduce them to other local families, ultimately increasing awareness about the many groups represented in the area."

Learn more about how Bentonville is celebrating diversity by uniting its multicultural community HERE.
